Title: The Little Mermaid
Plot: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.
Tagline: Somewhere under the sea and beyond your imagination is an adventure in fantasy.
Writers: John Musker, Ron Clements, Hans Christian Andersen
Stars: Jodi Benson, Samuel E. Wright, Rene Auberjonois
